import React from 'react' import { Dialog, DialogTitle, Grid, TextField, DialogActions, DialogContent, Button, } from '@material-ui/core' export default function AddFixedCostDialog(props) { const [state, setState] = React.useState() const handleChange = (e) => { setState({...state, [e.target.id]: e.target.value}) } return (
Add a fixed cost
) }
